myPeoples.name: Markham Cronin
myPeoples.description:
An award-winning art director and graphic designer, Markham Cronin has spent the last twenty five years in the creative departments of world renowned agencies such as Crispin Porter + Bogusky, Carmichael Lynch, and Brighthouse. He has worked with clients in every imaginable category, ranging from dot com start ups to Fortune 100 companies such as Coca Cola, AT&T, Delta Air Lines, Diageo, Home Depot, Harley Davidson and Porsche.

On a mission to leverage his big agency experience and cre ate best in class creative work, Markham founded his own agency in 2005. Leading a select team of creative talent, Markham has built an organization that brings a unique combination of entrepreneurial strategic thinking and world class creative execution f or a roster of clients ranging from local start ups to global conglomerates.

Markham has a Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design from the University of Georgia. His work has been featured on The Today Show, MSNBC, Communication Arts, The New York Times, USA Today, Fast Company, The CLIOs, The Advertising Festival at Cannes, The One Show, Adweek and People magazine.

When he’s not at the office, Markham can be found fishing, cycling, tinkering in his garage, or spending time with his family.

myPeoples.name: Jeff Steinhour
myPeoples.description:
Jeff joined Markham Cronin to form Markham & Stein in January 2016. Prior to Markham & Stein, he spent the previous 24 years at Crispin Porter + Bogusky where he served as Managing Partner and Global Vice-Chairman.  As an original Partner of CP+B, Jeff was instrumental in building the agency’s legendary creative reputation and its subsequent global growth to nine offices around the world. During his tenure at CP+B the agency was named Agency of the Year nine times over a 15 year period including Agency of the Decade (2000 – 2010) by Ad Age.

Today Jeff leads the business and operational functions of the agency working alongside Markham on all M&S accounts. With 29 years of agency management experience in almost every consumer category, Jeff adds sharp business acumen to the M&S team. He has managed and grown a diverse list of brands over the years including AT&T, Domino’s, Coke Zero, Nike, ConAgra, Mercedes-Benz, Volkswagen, IKEA, Best Buy, Arby’s, Virgin Atlantic, Applebee’s, Under Armour, Sprite, Fruit of the Loom and Hotels.com. The accounts he has personally led have won numerous national and international industry awards, including 24 Lions at the Cannes International Festival of Creativity.

Jeff currently serves on the Boards of several universities, including the University of Miami School of Communication, the University of Colorado School of Communications, University of Miami Business School Marketing Advisory Board and is Chairman of the Board of the Virginia Commonwealth University Brandcenter. He resides in Coral Gables with his wife and three children.

myPeoples.name: Jack Daniel Bagdadi
myPeoples.description:
An eleven-year veteran of M&S, Jack brings deep experience across industries and categories to the Creative department. Prior to joining M&S, Jack worked all over the world, from Prague to São Paolo, at Euro RSCG, Buongiorno, and Mark BBDO. He has experience on both general market and Hispanic market accounts such as Volvo Cars, Evian Water, Afrin, NY Ad Week, Toyota, GE Capital, Wrigleys, Mellow Mushroom Pizza, Personics Labs, Sushi Maki, DIAGEO, Oriental Bank and PETA.

Jack graduated from Tufts University and later studied art direction at the Miami Ad School. He is fluent in Spanish and French and holds dual American and Italian citizenship.

His work has been recognized by YoungGuns International, The One Show, The Gunn Report, The CLIOs, HOW, and Graphis.

myPeoples.name: Tristan Fernandez
myPeoples.description: Tristan has over 7 years of experience in Account Management and met Markham & Jeff during her time spent working at Crispin Porter + Bogusky. Her experience spans across multiple global and national, B2B and B2C accounts including MetLife, Ryder Systems Inc., Santa Margherita USA, the Miami International Boat Show, Michaels Craft Stores, Applebee’s, Callaway Golf Company and Odyssey Golf. She received a BS in Marketing from Clemson University and as a devoted alumna she spends her spare time rooting on her Tigers, hanging out with her english bulldog Olaf and enjoying the sunny outdoors of Miami.

myPeoples.name: Evie Macias
myPeoples.description: Evie joins Markham & Stein with 13 years of experience in Account Management across various categories across CPG, Retail, Beverage, Education and Healthcare and Dentistry. A Miami native, her advertising career started with U.S. Hispanic advertising for national brands such as S.C. Johnson, J.M. Smucker’s, Walgreens and General Motors. More recently, Evie has expanded her experience into General Market leading multi-channel campaigns across TV, Radio, Digital, and Social.  Evie received her degree from Stetson University where she was also the team captain of the cross-country team. In her spare time, she enjoys relaxing, boating with her family, travelling, eating a good meal and going for a run, well, it’s more like jogging these days.

myPeoples.name: Diana Nagles
myPeoples.description: Born and raised in Colombia, Diana has been working in the automotive industry for the past 12 years. She started in marketing and advertising at the dealer level working for SEAT, Skoda and Volkswagen. She then transitioned to leading the communications department for Audi in Colombia. In 2010 she moved to Miami and became the Account Director for Audi Latin America and the Caribbean, working with 25 markets. She enjoys the challenge LATAM regional marketing brings and has developed a keen understanding of these market’s localized needs. Diana has a degree in Marketing from Politécnico Gran Colombiano and a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration from the Escuela de Administración de Negocios, EAN.

myPeoples.name: Paulina Aquino
myPeoples.description: Paulina Aquino is the Director of Finance at Markham and Stein. Born in Santiago, Chile, she has resided in Florida since 1979. Paulina is a financial professional with a decade of work experience within the Advertising industry. As a mother and grandmother Paulina strongly believes in a work/life balance, increasing productivity, happiness, and reducing stress. Paulina is also a firm believer in the power of positive thinking; it has made it possible for her to reach new heights in my career and help others do the same for theirs. On a personal level, Paulina enjoys family time, shopping and is obsessed with shoes! She also enjoys dining out, good wine and of course, coffee.

myPeoples.name: Vanessa Doré
myPeoples.description:
Vanessa was born and raised in Miami, FL and has been working in the advertising world for the past 16 years. Her experience includes working with Hispanic and general market clients such as McDonald’s, Tobacco-Free Florida, Chevrolet, Nextel, U.S. Navy, Dewar’s 12, Kimberly-Clark and Burger King amongst others. She joined the team in 2014, putting her Project Manager skills to work and loving every minute of it.

When she’s not working she likes to travel, spend time outdoors and enjoy quality time with her family and her dogs. You can read about her adventures in her hiking blog trailtheway.com

myPeoples.name: Brent Carlin
myPeoples.description:
Brent has worked at Markham & Stein for just over three years, helping the team bring digital work to life. In addition to his expertise in digital production, Brent is an adept front-end developer with expertise is in using HTML5, CSS, and Javascript, as well as a digital designer and UX specialist. He is also a seasoned Flash and ActionScript 3 programmer and can work on a limited basis on back-end technologies such as PHP and MYSQL.

Brent has a degree in Web Design and Interactive Media from the Arts Institute of Fort Lauderdale and graduated from the University of Florida with a BA in History. He likes to spend his spare time working on a diverse set of side projects including screen printing, photography, processing, Arduino, Raspberry Pi, hacking electronics, WordPress theming and app development.

myPeoples.name: David Berry
myPeoples.description: David Berry, social media director, has been a strategist in social media since the channels began courting brands in the late-2000s. David has led social strategy and execution for a who's who of brands, including MetLife, which he managed as Social Marketing Supervisor at CP+B, and Dunkin' Donuts, Party City, Boston Market, Auto Nation, The Fresh Market and others, which he led as Associate Director at Zimmerman Advertising. David has an MBA from Florida International University and recently published his first book, The 10 Phases of Dating.

myPeoples.name: Carl Izzi
myPeoples.description: Lorem ipsum

myPeoples.name: Aly Lopez
myPeoples.description:
Aly freelanced for Markham after completing the internship program at neighboring agency, CP+B. Shortly after, she took a job as an Art Director at Ogilvy & Mather in New York City. While at Ogilvy she worked on materials for Citizens Bank, Castrol, IKEA, Time Warner, and SAP. After a lot of snowstorms and greasy street hotdogs, she came back to Miami to join the M&S team.

Aly has a degree in Advertising Strategy with a minor in Art & Art History from the University of Florida where she also served as the university’s official costumed mascot, Alberta. Her work has been recognized at the ADDYs, CLIO Awards, and she is a winner of the Big Ad Gig. In her spare time she works on her pottery and hangs out with her family and Boston Terrier, Doug.

myPeoples.name: Alina Tawil
myPeoples.description: Born and raised in Miami, Alina is an Account Supervisor with Markham & Stein. With over 8 years of industry experience, Alina has worked with both Hispanic and general market clients such as The Latin Recording Academy, Walmart, Dr Pepper Snapple Group, McDonalds, Univision, Kimberly Clark and Porsche Latin America. Upon completing her Master’s degree in Global Strategic Communications from Florida International University, Alina expanded her experience working on various experiential accounts as well as working within the communication & PR teams of two globally respected restaurant groups – Benihana and 50 Eggs, representing brand strategy and communications for various restaurant concepts. In her spare time, Alina loves to travel and spends most of her weekends going to concerts with friends, exploring the local craft beer scene and spending time with her four legged kids – Terrier mutt Melody and pair of cats Kuromi and Mishi, all of which are rescued from local shelters.

myPeoples.name: Katie Coffey
myPeoples.description: Katie joined Markham & Stein with 10 years of unique agency and client-side experience.  Prior to Markham & Stein, Katie spent two years as the Marketing Director at Mercedes-Benz of Coral Gables and Cutler Bay. Before that, Katie spent eight years at Crispin Porter + Bogusky in various account and project management roles. While she’s been in Miami for many years, she’s originally from Easton, Pennsylvania.  She has a Marketing and Business Management degree from Johnson & Wales University and spends her time as an active member of the Junior League of Miami. She is an avid animal-lover with two dogs at home, Stella and Roo.

myPeoples.name: Michael Perez
myPeoples.description:
Michael, a Miami native, is a media strategy professional with experience across all forms of media planning and buying including broadcast, OOH, digital and social. He has worked on multiple global and national accounts including Liebherr, Embraer, letgo, Logan’s Roadhouse, MetLife, Office Depot, Ryder System, Inc. and Santa Margherita USA. His career has been mainly working in tandem with creative teams (primarily at CP+B), working hard to elevate creative ideas through the use of media. Michael holds two degrees from the University of Florida; a Master of Arts in International Business and Bachelor of Arts in Advertising.

When not working, Michael is an avid sports fan following Miami sports teams, USA soccer and you guessed it, the Florida Gators.

myPeoples.name: Janet Cabrera
myPeoples.description: Born and bred in Miami, Janet Cabrera has never left town, happily. She attended Florida International University and graduated in 1995 with a Marketing and International Business degree. She has worked at many ad agencies here in Miami, including CreatAbility, CP+B, Sapient, Zubi Advertising and RBB Communications on accounts such as truth, MINI, Giro, Shimano, Citibank, Chase, Lincoln, Ford Social, Walgreens and Jackson Health System. She worked with Markham and Stein back in the CP+B days during the early 2000s!) In her free time, she loves to go on travel adventures with her 7-year-old son and loves dipping into art as well, with watercolor and gouache painting as her main focus, for now.
